name: Housing Authority of Corbin
description: The Housing Authority of Corbin provides affordable housing assistance through HUD's Public Housing Program. They offer low-income housing options and Section 8 housing vouchers to eligible families in Corbin and surrounding areas. The authority manages public housing units and administers housing assistance programs.
source: Verified from Google search results, FindHelp.org, and official housing authority listings
notes: Provides public housing and Section 8 vouchers. Waitlist information available by phone. Office hours: Monday-Friday 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM. Rated 3.8/5 stars on Google with 46 reviews.
